structure.unit: Inspection And Sale Of Food, Drugs And Various Articles

law.catch_line: Possession By Dealer Of Incorrectly Labeled Turpentine, Paint Or Linseed Oil
law.text: The having in possession, by any person dealing in such articles, of any article or substance designated in section two hundred and eighty-nine or two hundred and ninety-one, and marked or labelled contrary to said sections, shall be prima facie evidence that the same is kept by such person in violation of the provisions thereof.
